generated_description: ceramic pro markham, legally known as ceramic pro next gen, is an auto detailing company based in toronto, ontario. established in 2011 by hamza nadeem, the company specializes in providing professional car detailing, paint correction, and ceramic coatings. they also offer services such as paint protection film (ppf), window tinting, and new car preparations. ceramic pro markham is a member of the international detailers association and is recognized as a high-volume installer of ceramic pro products in canada. the company serves the greater toronto area, including markham, toronto, and surrounding regions, and is part of the ceramic pro elite dealer program, offering exclusive next generation ceramic pro coatings and kavaca performance films.
